settings.heading: FEEL BETTER FROM THE INSIDE OUT
settings.title: Testosterone Replacement Therapy
settings.body: Testosterone is a hormone produced primarily in the testicles which helps maintain men’s bone density, fat distribution, muscle mass, facial and body hair, sex drive, sperm production, and more. As you age, your testosterone level gradually declines. Testosterone replacement therapy, otherwise known as TRT, can improve the signs and symptoms of low testosterone in men.

settings.text: If you’re experiencing the below symptoms, a consultation with Balanced Aesthetics Medspa, including lab analysis to check your hormone levels, can get you started with testosterone replacement therapy. Be sure to thoroughly discuss all your medical concerns during your appointment to ensure you’re receiving the right advice.

In just a full 6-8 course treatment, most men experience a stronger libido and improved sexual stamina, as well as an increased sense of self and emotional balance. With continued TRT, men notice more muscle mass, better stress management, mental clarity, less belly fat, and improved physical performance and endurance.

settings.question: What Causes Low Testosterone?
settings.answer:
While the most common cause of low testosterone is age—about a 1% per year reduction in testosterone levels beginning at the age of 30—there are other possible causes as well. Injury to the testes, certain medications—like opioids or steroids—and some conditions like metabolic disorders or inflammatory diseases can contribute to low testosterone. How can you tell if you have a testosterone imbalance?

Signs and Symptoms of Low Testosterone:

• Fatigue/low energy

• Poor concentration

• Depressed mood

• Irritability

• Low libido (low sex drive)

• Sexual/erectile dysfunction

• Decreased muscle mass/increased body fat

• Decreased bone strength

settings.question: What are the Benefits of TRT?
settings.answer:
• Increased energy levels

• Improved cholesterol levels

• Increased muscle mass

• Improved sexual function

• Improved bone density

• Improved body composition

• Reduction in belly fat

• Better control over moods and irritability

settings.question: Our TRT Program
settings.answer:
1 full treatment lasts about 8-10 weeks

Consultation with our team to evaluate the following:

• Testosterone and hormone levels as well as overall health through lab work

• Evaluate needs and address goals such as anti-aging, weight loss, sexual health, muscle growth and repair, and sleep health

Includes:

• Carrying case and needles

• One post-cycle therapy

• Blood work

• All prescription medications

settings.text: It is important to note the benefits of hormone replacement therapy and testosterone replacement therapy will depend on the individual. It can take some time to achieve the correct dose to balance your testosterone levels, so you may require a bit of time to return to your old self. To learn more about TRT, please call our office.
